description:
Tiny Pentagon
It has been one month since Bunji started to go to cram school. Mom looks at the pentagon graph, where it shows the strengths and weaknesses of five different subjects. That`s when the Early Education Spirit appears.
Heart Pentagon
Mom thought Bunji is studying for his test, but he turns out to be doodling. Mom was about to tell him off, but that is when a Love Spirit that looks like Dad appears!
Dream Boyfriend
The street down by the seaside. A red convertible sports car dashes down the road. There`s a cool looking blond guy in the driver`s seat. And then in the passenger seat, Fumi...?
Sleeping Alone
A story that happened a little while ago. Bunji and Fumi usually sleep together, but as Bunji`s snoring is too loud, both of them tried to sleep by themselves...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Small Pentagon / Heart Pentagon / Dream Boyfriend / Sleeping Alone
小さなペンタゴン / ハートのペンタゴン / 夢の彼氏 / ひとり寝
